Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurs in cases that eventually lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR compared to the frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are immediately followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR among all FOR_APPROVAL activities (i.e., compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR appears but Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER never occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that occur after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in successful end-to-end variants ending in Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of variants in which Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR directly precedes Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of all FOR_APPROVAL handovers that are assigned to SUPERVISOR rather than PRE_APPROVER or ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases that have exactly one approval step after submission (indicating supervisor and budget owner are the same person, per log description)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurrences that belong to the top three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in variants that do not contain any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are not followed by any rejection activity within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events that occur in cases later rejected by any actor (including PRE_APPROVER, ADMINISTRATION, BUDGET OWNER, or SUPERVISOR)
